name: EX REL Barbara BRYANT Foreign Estate, Non Resident Alien Foreign Neutral, in Propria Persona Sui Juris Inter Vivos, Petitioner v. Former Commissioner Clarena I. TOLSON and Current Frank Breslin, City of Philadelphia Department of Revenue

parties: EX REL Barbara BRYANT Foreign Estate, Non Resident Alien Foreign Neutral, in Propria Persona Sui Juris Inter Vivos, Petitioner v. Former Commissioner Clarena I. TOLSON and Current Frank Breslin, City of Philadelphia Department of Revenue

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 30th day of September, 2016, the Application for Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
